snippet: The Pew survey of respondents in 10 European countries shows increasing unhappiness with the bloc during a period of low growth and a crisis in migration.
abstract: Pew Research Poll shows growing dissatisfaction with European Union throughout bloc over course of year, with Spain and France expressing particularly negative views and two-thirds of Britons favoring return of some powers to national government.
lead_paragraph: The Pew survey of respondents in 10 European countries shows increasing unhappiness with the bloc during a period of low growth and a crisis in migration.

headline.main: Disenchantment with E.U. Grows, Poll Finds
headline.print_headline: Discontent  With E.U.  Is Growing,  Poll Finds
